mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT BOARD.BIDX, BOARD.B_TYPE, BOARD.B_TITLE, BOARD.B_CONTENT, BOARD.B_WRITEDATE, BOARD.B_HIT, BOARD.DELYN, BOARD.TIDX, AFPS_MEMBER.T_NAME, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BOARD.B_TYPE DESC, BIDX DESC) AS RNUM FROM BOARD, AFPS_MEMBER WHERE 1=1 AND BOARD.TIDX = #{userIdx} AND BOARD.DELYN='N' AND BOARD.TIDX = AFPS_MEMBER.TIDX ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY B_TYPE DESC, BIDX DESC

SELECT A.*,C.* FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY EIDX DESC)NUM, A.*,B.T_LEAVE_GET FROM ANNUAL_LEAVE A LEFT JOIN AFPS_MEMBER B ON A.TIDX = B.TIDX ORDER BY EIDX DESC) A JOIN ELECTRONIC_APPROVAL C ON A.EIDX = C.EIDX WHERE C.DELYN = 'N'

SELECT A.*,C.* FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY EIDX DESC)NUM, A.*,B.T_LEAVE_GET FROM ANNUAL_LEAVE A LEFT JOIN AFPS_MEMBER B ON A.TIDX = B.TIDX WHERE A.TIDX = #{userIdx} ORDER BY EIDX DESC) A JOIN ELECTRONIC_APPROVAL C ON A.EIDX = C.EIDX WHERE C.DELYN = 'N' AND NUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd}

SELECT COUNT(SIDX) FROM ( SELECT A.*, B.T_NAME, T_ID, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY SIDX DESC) AS RNUM FROM SCHEDULE_MANAGEMENT A LEFT JOIN AFPS_MEMBER B ON A.TIDX = B.TIDX WHERE A.TIDX = #{userIdx} AND A.DELYN = 'N') WHERE DELYN = 'N'

SELECT EIDX_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO ELECTRONIC_APPROVAL(EIDX, E_DOCUMENTNUM, E_RULE, E_DRAFTDATE, E_STARTDAY, E_CON, E_SEND, E_TEXTTITLE, E_TEXTCONTENT,E_TYPE,TIDX) VALUES( EIDX_SEQ.NEXTVAL, EIDX_DOCUMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{e_rule}, #{e_draftdate}, #{e_startday}, #{e_con}, #{e_send}, #{e_texttitle}, #{e_textcontent}, '개인일정', #{tidx} )

INSERT INTO ANNUAL_LEAVE(EIDX,A_TYPE,A_STARTDATE,A_ENDDATE,A_USEDDAYS,TIDX) VALUES( #{eidx}+1, #{a_type}, TO_DATE(#{a_startdate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), TO_DATE(#{a_enddate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), #{a_useddays}, #{tidx} )
mapper.update: UPDATE AFPS_MEMBER SET T_LEAVE_GET = #{a_useddays} WHERE TIDX = #{tidx}
mapper.select: SELECT A.*,B.*,C.* FROM ELECTRONIC_APPROVAL A LEFT JOIN APPROVAL_LINE B ON A.EIDX = B.EIDX INNER JOIN ANNUAL_LEAVE C ON A.EIDX = C.EIDX WHERE DELYN = 'N' AND A.EIDX = #{eidx}
mapper.update: UPDATE ELECTRONIC_APPROVAL SET DELYN = 'Y' WHERE EIDX = #{eidx}

UPDATE ELECTRONIC_APPROVAL SET E_RULE = #{e_rule}, E_STARTDAY = #{e_startday}, E_CON = #{e_con}, E_SEND = #{e_send}, E_TEXTTITLE = #{e_texttitle}, E_TEXTCONTENT = #{e_textcontent} WHERE EIDX = #{eidx}
